participant_1.background:
My first day of safety patrol is a little nerve-wracking, but I'm excited to help keep my school safe.
pudding makes me gassy.
I look forward to sharing my opinions with others and starting a new life in Australia.
I drive a Subaru Outback because it is roomy for my quilting supplies and my mountain bike.
I have an interest in fashion and try to wear nice clothes every day.

participant_2.background:
I'm a bit out of touch with my family because of my job, but I'm trying to get better at it.
i am colour blind.
I am still trying to lose weight.
my favorite animal is the panda.
i am an angry person.

content.text: Hey, I'm doing well! I'm starting my new job in fashion today, and I'm excited to see how it goes! How about you?
Oh wow! That's exciting! I'm just starting my first day of safety patrol at school, I'm a little nervous but I'm excited to help keep my school safe!
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll do great! I wish I was still in school, I miss those days!
Thanks, I hope so! Do you have any pets?
Yeah, I have a dog named Panda. He's a big, fluffy panda bear, and he's my best friend!
Oh my gosh, I love pandas! I'm so jealous! Do you have any pictures of him?
Yeah, I do! Here, check this out! (Sent a picture of Panda)
OH MY GOSH HE'S SO CUTE! I love his little face!
Thanks, I'm glad you like him!
So, what are your plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet, maybe I'll go shopping or something. What about you?
I'm not sure either, maybe I'll go for a bike ride or something.
That sounds like fun! Maybe we could go together sometime?
Awesome! I'll text you my number
